page.title: 01Gazetteer of Aston Clinton
page.content: {Tring}- Our main town which holds many factories and shops.A suburban area. Aston Clinton - One of the major villages in our area.It contains many roads such as the A41 which goes from London to Manchester.It has many shops of different types. {Buckland}- This dreamy little village is pleasant and incorporates one of the largest archery centres in Europe.Also in this village is a most quaint old church which has a history of over 500 years old. {Buckland Wharf}- Once this was joined with Buckland but separated and has its own pub on the sort of border. Wilstone-A village which is old but beautiful.Nearby there is a reservoir which is a National Nature Reserve for the British Trust for Ornithology.
